control_attributes.Control: CP-7 (6) INABILITY TO RETURN TO PRIMARY SITE
control_attributes.control_description: The organization plans and prepares for circumstances that preclude returning to the primary processing site.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization stores backup copies of [Assignment: organization-defined critical information system software and other security-related information] in a separate facility or in a fire-rated container that is not collocated with the operational system.

Control Statement: The organization plans and prepares for circumstances that preclude returning to the primary processing site.
Control Name: CP-7 (6) INABILITY TO RETURN TO PRIMARY SITE
